articles.title: Open Letter of WPK Central Committee to Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
WPK Central Committee Sends Open Letter to Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) sent an open letter to foreign political parties on Sept. 24.
					 The letter extended friendly greetings to foreign political parties making efforts for the peace and security of the world and the social development and the wellbeing of the people.
					
					 It recalled that the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK declared he would make the U.S. chief executive pay dearly for denying the existence of the DPRK, defaming it and talking rude nonsense calling for totally destroying it under the eyes of the world.
					
					 The statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK reflected the wrath and will of all the Party members and other people determined to fight against the U.S. imperialists to the last and finish them as they dared defame the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and revealed their attempt to plunge the Korean people into the crucible of a horrible nuclear war, the letter said, adding:
					
					 The statement greatly encourages the world progressive political parties and people in their struggle for frustrating the war provocation moves of the U.S. imperialists, the chieftains of imperialist reaction and harassers of the world peace, and for building a new society, independent, peaceful and just.
					
					 Today, to resolutely struggle against the U.S. imperialists regarding aggression and war as their mode of existence serves as a main way of ensuring the peace and security of the world.
					
					 In order to realize the genuine international justice and to defend elementary right to existence of mankind, it is necessary to counter nukes of tyranny with the nuclear treasured sword of justice. This is the truth that the DPRK-U.S. confrontation teaches the world.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea ardently appeals to foreign political parties valuing independence, justice and peace to turn out as one in the joint action and front to frustrate the U.S. reckless moves to plunge the world into the nuclear disaster.
					
					 It also expressed the expectation that they would send invariable support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their just struggle for safeguarding the sovereignty and dignity and the right to existence of the country and for defending the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region.

articles.title: Open Letter to Parliaments of Different Countries
articles.content:
Open Letter to Parliaments of Different Countries
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea sent an open letter to parliaments of different countries of the world on Sunday.
					 The letter said that Trump, president of the U.S. styling itself the "superpower", denied the existence of the DPRK, a dignified sovereign state, and spit out ignorant remarks of "total destruction" at the UN General Assembly, the greatest official diplomatic forum, stunning the world public.
					
					 The Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK the basic mission of which is to promote friendly and cooperation relations with all parliaments and peace-loving people, proceeding from the foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea regarding independence, peace and friendship as its idea, bitterly condemned the reckless remarks of Trump as an intolerable insult to the Korean people, a declaration of war against the DPRK and grave threats to the global peace.
					
					 The letter went on:
					
					 From the first day of his office Trump has conducted high-handed and arbitrary practices, scrapping international laws and agreements incurring his displeasure on the "U.S.-first principle", the height of American-style thinking way that it is best if the U.S. is well-off at the expense of the whole world.
					
					 The U.S. brought to their knees those countries devoid of principle, narrow-minded and selfish countries seeking after their interests only with nuclear stick and force and cooked up the illegal "resolution on sanctions against the DPRK" denying the elementary right to existence of the Korean people and checking normal development of economy in breach of the inviolable UN Charter by abusing the UN Security Council. This is an intensive act of the revelation of the "U.S.-first principle".
					
					 Trump threatened to totally destroy the DPRK, dignified independent and sovereign state and nuclear power. This is the extreme act of threatening to totally destroying the whole world.
					
					 If Trump thinks that he would bring the DPRK, a nuclear power to its knees through nuclear war threat, it is a big miscalculation and ignorance.
					
					 The DPRK has emerged as a nuclear power true to its name as it has built the powerful arsenal of nukes and multifarious means of delivery of nuclear weapons by dint of self-reliance and self-development. The real enemy the nuclear force of the DPRK tries to match is a nuclear war itself.
					
					 The Foreign Affairs Committee of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK expresses belief that parliaments of different countries in the world loving independence, peace and justice would take this opportunity to fulfill their due missions and duties in realizing human desire for international justice and peace with sharp vigilance against the heinous and reckless moves of the Trump administration trying to drive the world into the horrible nuclear disaster.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Official Leaves for Moscow
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Official Leaves for Moscow
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Son Hui, director general of the North American Department of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, and her party left here Monday to visit Moscow at the invitation of Oleg Burmistrov, roving ambassador of the Foreign Ministry of the Russian Federation who visited the DPRK from July 22 to 25.
					 Talks with the roving ambassador are due in Moscow.

articles.title: Trump Branded as Hooligan Wrecking Peace, Not Politician
articles.content:
Trump Branded as Hooligan Wrecking Peace, Not Politician
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Religious Believers Council of Korea issued a statement Monday denouncing the silly old man of the U.S. for spiting such unprecedented remarks as "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					 No chief executive of a country has made such bullying rubbish of vowing "total destruction" of a sovereign state before the world, regardless of time and place like Trump in the present era of modern civilization, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The religionists of the DPRK have long branded the U.S. imperialist ogres as a group of Satans and Asuras as they savagely bombarded thousands of religious facilities and barbarously killed hundreds of thousands of innocent religionists during the Korean War ignited by them.
					
					 Soon after taking office in the White House, hotbed of all evils, Trump has threatened and blackmailed all the countries and rendered the world restless. It is certain that he is a gangster and hooligan challenging justice and destroying peace, not a politician.
					
					 His rubbish is grumble of a lunatic breathing his last, being driven into the precipice of miserable destruction, and a last-ditch struggling of those taken aback by the dynamic footsteps of the DPRK dashing ahead for a bright future.
					
					 Justice can never go together with injustice and lightness and darkness can never stay together.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the world can not be peaceful and the desire of religionists for justice and peace can never be realized as long as Trump and his group are allowed to stay. 
					
					 We, religionists who value love, peace and justice, can never tolerate the inhuman and mentally deranged behavior of Trump, going reckless to totally destroy the cradle of the religious life while denying the existence of the dignified sovereign state after totally discarding the hypocritical veil of "apostle of peace".
					
					 Greatly emboldened by the statement of the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, all the religionists in the DPRK will wage more vigorously the nationwide sacred war to tame a peerlessly demon Trump, the ringleader of aggression and kingpin of destruction and slaughter, with the fire of justice, together with the army and other people.

articles.title: Chondoist Chongu Party Denounces Trump's Remarks
articles.content:
Chondoist Chongu Party Denounces Trump's Remarks
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party issued a statement Monday in denunciation of U.S. President Trump's reckless remarks at the UN General Assembly.
					 It stressed that the historic statement of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as regards Trump's reckless remarks was a stern declaration of final doom to the empire of evils U.S. and Trump and a declaration of the noblest justice of his patriotism to firmly protect the destiny of the country and its people and ever-lasting future of the Korean nation.
					
					 There were brutal maniacs who felt pleasure in suppressing and invading other nations but the history does not know such inhumane and ignorant gangster and imprudent rogue as Trump who openly declared he would destroy one country, state and nation at the official international forum, the statement stated, and went on:
					
					 Mounting day by day is the retaliatory will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK enraged at the invectives of rabid Trump who revealed the attempt to drive the Korean people into the disaster of a nuclear war while daring to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 The group of brutes is making desperate efforts to destroy the DPRK, the life which can not be bartered for anything and can never be seized. We cannot tolerate this. 
					
					 We Chondoists, who have carried forward the tradition of patriotism under the banner of "Rejection of the West and Japan" and "Promotion of National Interests and Welfare of the People", will turn out, together with all the service personnel and people, in the all-out charge against the U.S. to force Trump to pay dearly for his reckless invectives as he denied our inviolable state and extremely insulted the Korean nation.
					
					 The rabid dotard Trump cannot evade a merciless divine punishment.

articles.title: Korean Youth Will Stamp out Deranged Americans for Final Victory in Showdown with U.S.: Youth League Spokesman
articles.content:
Korean Youth Will Stamp out Deranged Americans for Final Victory in Showdown with U.S.: Youth League Spokesman
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Korean youths, regarding it as their lifeline to devotedly safeguard their leader, solemnly declare the will of the young vanguard to wipe out all the deranged men going reckless, being unaware of who their rival is, and bring about the final victory in the showdown with the U.S.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, stressed this in a statement Monday.
					
					 Trump threatened to "totally destroy" the DPRK, in violation of the dignity of the supreme leadership and the sovereignty of the DPRK, at an official UN General Assembly session, not at White House or at golf range. His hysteric outburst is the most heinous provocation and never-to-be pardoned hideous crime against the Koreans including youth.
					
					 Trump fond of barking as he pleases is not a politician but a boss of gangsters and a rabid dog, not human, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Whenever ignorant gangster Trump trumpeted about "military option" and "toughest sanctions and pressure", failing to have elementary understanding of the situation, we repeatedly warned him to come to his senses and even showed off the tremendous might of Juche Korea with the ICBM launch and detonation of H-bomb.
					
					 But the silly old man who failed to evolve into a human, was hard of hearing. So we proved that a stick fits a rabid dog and fire should be responded with fire.
					
					 Our generation will write the final page of the shameful end of the U.S. by carrying forward the tradition of victory displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners who defeated the ferocious gangster-like Japanese imperialists in the forests of Mt Paektu, and by the heroic fighters in the 1950s who humbled the arrogance of the U.S. imperialists and created the July 27 myth of war victory.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Held in Various Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Held in Various Parts of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in Jagang and North and South Hamgyong provinces and Rason City on September 24 to vow to turn out in the anti-U.S. showdown to achieve the final victory.
					 Present there were officials of party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities and working people and youth and students.
					
					 The statement of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, was read out at the rallies to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers said that the crazy behavior of Trump who vociferated ignorant and insane remarks like "total destruction" of the DPRK in front of the world is the extreme insult and the undisguised declaration of a war against the dignified DPRK which can never be tolerated even a bit.
					
					 The reality clearly shows once again that the U.S. imperialists, who denied the supreme dignity of the DPRK and its existence taking issue with its self-defensive and righteous building up of nuclear force, are the most shameless and wicked archenemies and group of devils disturbing peace and gravely threatening existence of mankind.
					
					 They underscored the need for all the fields and units to sincerely carry out the instructions of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the Party's policies by further firmly establishing the Party's unified leadership system to correspond to the coming acute situation of the life-and-death battle with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers can neither stop nor check the dynamic advance of the DPRK leaping forward under the guidance of Kim Jong Un and by dint of the tremendous state nuclear force and unique single-minded unity in the world.
					
					 Mass demonstrations took place.
					
					 Their participants marched past squares and streets, loudly chanting slogans of firm faith and will of the Korean people to settle accounts with the decades-long anti-U.S. battle and surely achieve the final victory of socialist cause.

articles.title: Spanish Party Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Spanish Party Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the People of Spain led by Victor Manuel Lucas, international secretary of its Central Committee, arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: State Commission of Quality Management Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
State Commission of Quality Management Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Commission of Quality Management led by Chairman Ri Chol Jin returned home Monday after taking part in the 2017 general meeting of the International Organization for Standardization held in Berlin.

articles.title: 13th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
13th Pyongyang Autumn Int'l Trade Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The 13th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair opened at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House Monday with due ceremony.
					 Attending the ceremony were Ri Ju O, vice-premier of the Cabinet; Kim Yong Jae, minister of External Economic Relations; Kim In Chol, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, and officials of economic and trade organs and delegations from different countries and regions of the world and members of foreign diplomatic missions here.
					
					 Pak Ung Sik, president of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, gave an opening address and then O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 Speakers said that the trade fair would offer a good opportunity in promoting the friendship and cooperation among countries and contributing to the multilateral interchange and the development of regional economy.
					
					 They expressed the will to boost the external economic relations with countries and regions on the principle of equality and mutual benefit and continue developing the bilateral and multilateral cooperation.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants went round the products displayed by companies from the DPRK, Syria, China, Cuba, Iran, Italy, Indonesia, Vietnam and Taipei of China and other countries and regions.
					
					 The fair will last till Sept. 28.

articles.title: Yun I Sang Concert Given
articles.content:
Yun I Sang Concert Given
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- There took place the 36th Yun I Sang Concert at the Moranbong Theatre on Monday.
					 Among the audience were Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, Hong Kyong Ho, director of the Yun I Sang Music Institute, officials concerned, creators and artistes of national art troupes, teachers and students in the field of art education, diplomatic envoys of different countries and staff members of the missions of international bodies here and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans. 
					
					 The artistes of the Orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute and the National Symphony Orchestra staged the concert.
					
					 In the concert which began with orchestra "Arirang", the performers presented with refined rendition, rich voice and perfect ensemble the lyric songs composed by Yun in the early period of his activities, including symphonic poem  "You Kwangju Forever," female solo "Spinning Wheel Ballad" and piano trio "Loving Care for My Destiny".

articles.title: National Exhibition of IT Successes 2017
articles.content:
National Exhibition of IT Successes 2017
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The national exhibition of IT successes 2017 was recently held at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House in Pyongyang, the DPRK.
					 On display at the exhibition, the theme of which is "Mallima era and IT enthusiasm," were a number of IT successes and products.
					
					 What caught visitors' eyes were the national integrated power control system completed by the Electric Power Information Institute under the Ministry of Electric Power Industry and satellite data interpretation system presented by the Global Environmental Information Institute of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 Among exhibits were also tele-education system, study censoring system, tele-study program based on wireless network and tablet computer and knowledge-testing and study aid program.
					
					 The IT Institute of the High-Tech Science Institute under Kim Il Sung University, IT Institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Samhung IT Exchange Company and other seven units were selected as the ten best IT enterprises and plastic 3D printer and other nine products as the ten best IT products.
					
					 The exhibition showed the rapid progress of the country's information technology invariably developing despite of the heinous blockade and sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.

articles.title: Premiere Given in Hamhung City
articles.content:
Premiere Given in Hamhung City
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe began a music and dance performance before full house at the Hamhung Grand Theatre in South Hamgyong Province on Sept. 24.
					 Among the audience were Kim Song Il, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Kim Pong Yong, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, and other leading officials in the province and officials, technicians and workers at major industrial establishments in the province and other working people, youth and students in Hamhung City.
					
					 The artistes gave an exciting and new performance with songs of socialist advance reflecting the courageous spirit of Juche Korea.
					
					 The performance began with the National Anthem.
					
					 Put on the stage were light music and serial songs "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care", female solo "We Call You Father", mixed chorus and male chorus "We Cannot Live without You", light music "Pyongyang Is Best", female chorus "Glory of Our Life", female chorus and male chorus "Let's Keep the Revolutionary Faith to the Death", dance "Dash toward Future", tap dance "Young Days" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively represented deep reverence and trust of the service persons and the people for respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is demonstrating the dignity and might of Juche Korea to the world with his matchless pluck and grit and successfully translating all dreams and ideals of the people into brilliant reality.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience, evoking a lively response among them.
					
					 It will continue.

articles.title: DPRK Women Footballers Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Women Footballers Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK women footballers returned home on Monday after winning in the 2017 AFC U-16 Women's Championship.
					 Footballer Kim Kyong Yong won the best player and top scorer prize.
					
					 The footballers and coaches were greeted by Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jang San, secretary general of the DPRK Football Association, and officials concerned.
					
					 Sportspersons and families of the footballers presented garlands and bunches of flowers to the players and coaches, congratulating them on their successful games.
					
					 Pyongyangites gave warm welcome to the footballers along streets of the city.
					
					 The players and coaches visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to lay a floral basket and bouquets and pay tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful in the Far East Student Sports Festival "New Generation-2017".
					 The festival held in Russia from September 21 to 24 brought together more than 670 men and women players from different countries including the DPRK, Russia and China.
					
					 The DPRK players bagged 5 gold medals, 5 silver medals, 6 bronze medals and 5 trophy cups.
					
					 Kim Chol Gwang and Ri Un Song came first in men's 73kg Judo event and 81kg Judo event each.
					
					 Choe Mun Hyang and An Jong Sun won the table-tennis women's team event and Choe Su Rim won in the women's 50 meters, 100 meters butterfly.
					
					 The Korean players returned home on Monday.

articles.title: Posters Reflecting Public Sentiment Produced
articles.content:
Posters Reflecting Public Sentiment Produced
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Seen in various parts of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, are posters with themes like "Answer of the DPRK!" and "The whole U.S. mainland is in our striking range!"
					 The posters reflect the public sentiment of the DPRK to wipe the whole U.S. land, a theater of evil rampage, off the map.
					
					 A poster shows the DPRK's rockets diving towards the U.S. to turn its whole land into a sea of fire and blow up the White House to pieces.
					
					 All the posters carrying pictures of powerful Juche strategic weapons reflect the firm determination and will of the DPRK army and people to exterminate the Yankees who are desperately keen on stifling the sovereignty of the DPRK and its rights to existence and development.
					
					 Kim Chol, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University, in an interview with KCNA in Ryomyong Street said that whenever he sees the posters depicting the vapor trail of the ICBMs fully charged with pent-up retaliatory spirit of all Koreans and the U.S. mainland turned into a sea of fire, he is excited with the will to totally destroy the enemies.
					
					 Kim Ok Ryon, a resident in Central District, said:
					
					 My country is one of world military powers possessed of ICBM-ready H-bomb, the "absolute weaponry" on the earth. It is quite natural to finish those American blood-thirsty zombies with fire. We should annihilate the U.S., the empire of evils, with our nuclear weapons of justice.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Attaining Goal of Completing Nuclear Force of DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Attaining Goal of Completing Nuclear Force of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Former and present American officials and foreign experts on the Korean affairs are vociferating about  the recent successful launching drill of Hwasong-12 by the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Monday says:
					
					 Their screams clearly show that the U.S. imperialists are astonished by the might of Songun Korea.
					
					 The hostile policy towards the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail only result in putting the America's destiny on the verge of a final downfall.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of our state to advance along the road chosen by itself to the end despite the U.S. toughest sanctions and pressure and military threat and blackmail.
					
					 Atrocious and stupid Trump who has no political career, appearance as befitting politician and elementary etiquette and morality as a human being, revealed the nature of a mad dog.
					
					 His crazy behavior clearly proves that the road chosen by ourselves was definitely right.
					
					 Our army and people are determined to attain the goal of completing the state nuclear force without fail, hardening their will to surely and definitely tame the U.S. with fire.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the fate of America will be led to the final doom in the face of the measures of our Republic for bolstering up the nuclear force.

articles.title: Wild Dream of War Maniac U.S. Revealed
articles.content:
Wild Dream of War Maniac U.S. Revealed
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a commentary Monday says a new revelation puts it that the U.S. has worked out in top secrecy a "strategy for controlling Korea" allegedly to cope with the situation after occupying the DPRK by force.
					 The British newspaper The Sun disclosed the news, quoting an American journalist who said that he came to know through sources related to the think-tank close to Trump that a study has secretly been underway to cope with the situation following a war with the DPRK. The paper added that the military experts are analyzing and using the lessons drawn from the armed uprisings during the U.S. occupation of Iraq.
					
					 The paper also reported that earlier the executive director of the U.S. Center for Strategic and International Studies confessed in a press conference that they have looked into the ways of coping with guerrilla war tactics against the U.S. forces on the Korean territory. Media of other countries also identified that the U.S. is setting up in top secrecy the "strategy for controlling Korea" after the war with reference to 2003 U.S. invasion of Iraq and 2011 NATO's interference in the Libyan incident in anticipation of possible uprising and disturbances following the U.S. forces' military occupation of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. fully disclosed its nature as a war maniac.
					
					 Time for talk has passed. There are limitations to the patience and self-constraint of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The powerful Paektusan revolutionary army full of towering hatred and will to take revenge on the enemies are waiting for the order of opening fire after putting even the U.S. mainland, to say nothing of the U.S. forces bases in Asia-Pacific, in its striking range.
					
					 As the U.S. made an open declaration of war to totally destroy the DPRK, the army and people of the DPRK with the honor of Juche Korea will make the provokers pay a dear price.

articles.title: DPRK Will Triumph in Stand-off with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Triumph in Stand-off with U.S.: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) ? The successful launching drill of intermediate strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 held under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was a powerful sledge-hammer for mercilessly smashing the tyrannical nukes, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 Songun Korea's steady offensive is a stern warning to the foolish U.S. policy-makers dreaming of bringing down the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 As was proven by the successful launching drill of Hwasong-12, Guam, ill-famed U.S. imperialist aggression forces' military base, is within the striking range of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is at a loss, being frightened by the high spirit of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK fully ready to impose horrible and bitter defeat on the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK has been possessed of powerful ballistic rockets and H-bomb capable of frustrating the U.S. ambition for aggression. This has fundamentally changed the world political and strategic landscape and provided a firm guarantee for defending peace and security in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 The brigandish U.S. imperialists are making most vicious provocations against the DPRK in political, military, economic and all other fields. To cope with this, the DPRK will stoutly build up the strength of justice to root out the source of aggression and war and to settle accounts with the enemies.
					
					 As it is led by the peerlessly great man possessed of spirit, pluck and invincible strategy of Mt Paektu as his inborn dispositions, the DPRK will surely emerge victorious in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 The thunderbolt of justice by Songun Korea will continue to resound far and wide until the day of final victory.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK and Anti-Chongryon Moves in Japan Denounced
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK and Anti-Chongryon Moves in Japan Denounced
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities unilaterally turned down without any legal grounds the just demand raised by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and the Koreans in Tokyo for the application of the tuition-free program for senior high schools to the students of Tokyo Korean Middle and High School of Chongryon by setting in motion the Tokyo District Court shortly ago.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says that the ruthless act of dampening the strong desire of Koreans in Japan to defend the right to national education for their children can be committed by those steeped in hostility toward the DPRK and Chongryon to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are entirely to blame for this.
					
					 The shameless decision made by the Tokyo District Court is an indication of the deep-rooted intention of the Japanese reactionaries to deprive Koreans in Japan of their right to national education.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the hostile discrimination is timed to coincide with the frantic moves against the DPRK and Chongryon by finding fault with the DPRK's just measure for bolstering the nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' persistent political suppression and persecution of Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan will add to the wrath of the Koreans against Japan and harden their pledge to settle full accounts with it.
					
					 Their vicious acts of abusing national education of Koreans in Japan as a means for putting political and diplomatic pressure can never be tolerated.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Conservatives' Nuclear War Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Conservatives' Nuclear War Moves
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- U.S. warmongers bereft of reason are showing their teeth of aggression, calling for "military choice" against the DPRK and "total destruction" of it.
					 Against this backdrop, members of the "Liberal Korea Party" in south Korea are openly crying out for "going nuclear" under the pretext of the DPRK measures for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun comments Monday that their begging for the redeployment of tactical nuclear weapons of the U.S. can never be justified as it is an indelible treachery to the country and nation through which to make the inviolable territory of Korea and the Korean nation fall victim to U.S. nuclear war.
					
					  The commentary goes on:
					
					  The traitors, who turned the whole of south Korea into a nuclear war advanced base of the U.S. and have acted as faithful war servants of their American master, are now calling for "exercise of the right to self-defense" and "nuclear counteraction". This is nothing but an impudent action.
					
					 As if nuclear attack is imminent, they are busy building the public opinion that early introduction of the U.S. tactical nuclear weapons into south Korea is a way out. But nobody will lend ear to such assertion.
					
					  Their action will bring them nothing but disgrace and death.

articles.title: Koreans in China Vow to Turn Out in Final Battle against U.S.
articles.content:
Koreans in China Vow to Turn Out in Final Battle against U.S.
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on September 22 stressed that all its officials and Korean citizens in China, upon hearing the statement issued by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as regards the rubbish of the U.S. president at the UN General Assembly, have expressed full support to it, burning their hearts with the pledge to turn out in do-or-die battle.
					 It said that the rubbish of Trump, a rabid old man of the U.S., is unpardonable violent words of the war maniac, human butcher and politico-layman which reflect the sworn enemy U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK and their ambition to stifle it by force of arms.
					
					 Under the leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, the Korean people have built up the inexhaustible national strength, tightening their belts century after century so as not to face a miserable fate of slaves by the imperialists again, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Trump and his yes men are trying to frighten the people in the homeland with reckless remarks such as "regime change," "toppling of social system" and "total destruction". But, they should clearly know that their bid is a daydream to cover the sun with a palm.
					
					 Our homeland, which makes no empty talk, will tame Trump, a rascal engrossed in reckless crazy behavior, with the toughest action and the world will soon witness the results.
					
					 The General Association and all Koreans in China will remain intensely loyal to the guidance of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, the greatest man and the most brilliant commander, and vigorous struggle together with the people in the homeland to win the final victory in the do-or-die battle against the U.S. imperialists for protecting the destiny and dignity of the nation and peace.

articles.title: Young Koreans in China Vow to Take Lead in Confrontation with U.S.
articles.content:
Young Koreans in China Vow to Take Lead in Confrontation with U.S.
Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China on Sept. 23 made public a statement condemning Trump as a trigger-happy rogue and hooligan and mentally deranged man who has no elementary character of being the president as he made no scruple of talking unethical nonsense calling for "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					The statement said that young Koreans in China would take the lead in the confrontation with the U.S., together with the large contingent of youths in the homeland, cherishing deep the firm faith that the U.S. is bound to go to ruin and the victory of Juche homeland is science as they are guided by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, and clearly show the mettle of overseas youth detachment of the Paektusan youth power to the reckless U.S. imperialist aggressors.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Vocero de la Union de la Juventud advierte a EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Bulgaria, round-table talks in Iran, France, Brazil and Ethiopia and reading sessions in Nigeria and Angola from Aug. 30 to Sep. 9 to celebrate the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The chairman of the France-Korea Friendship Association said that President Kim Il Sung developed the DPRK into a dignified socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence and wisely led the drive for national reunification and the struggle for global independence and leader Kim Jong Il firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and laid strong foundation for building a socialist power with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 A message of greeting to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Trump's Reckless Remarks Sparks off Anger
articles.content:
Trump's Reckless Remarks Sparks off Anger
 Pyongyang, September 25 (KCNA) -- Frightened by the might of the DPRK vigorously advancing demonstrating its tremendous military power, rabid rogue Trump spit out heinous invectives at the UN General Assembly to spark off big resentment and astonishment of the world.
					 Political parties and organizations of India, Ukraine and Russia on September 22 made public statements in denunciation of the "politico-layman" and "politico-pagan".
					
					 The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) bitterly condemned the invectives of Trump to totally destroy the DPRK and said that threats to sovereign states can not be pardoned but deserves rejection.
					
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said Trump's rubbish at the UNGA was contrary to the UN Charter and reckless remarks to justify the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that the gangster of Washington continued to spit out ignorant remarks as he was seized with fear and despair before the might of the DPRK which has access to nukes.
					
					 The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK said that Trump, who used to spit out exuberant remarks to advertise himself, is a silly dotard as he lets out his own words failing to understand what others say.
					
					 The Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia said Trump's reckless remarks at the UNGA were a mockery of not only the Korean people but also all other people of the world, and the Korean people will deal a heavy sledge-hammer strike at the wicked enemies leaving no means untried to stifle socialist Korea.

articles.title: CC del PTC envia carta abierta a partidos politicos de varios paises
articles.content:
CC del PTC envia carta abierta a partidos politicos de varios paises
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 24 una carta abierta a los partidos politicos de varios paises del mundo.
					 En su misiva, el CC del PTC extendio el saludo amistoso a los partidos politicos que luchan por la paz y la seguridad del mundo y por el desarrollo social y el bienestar del pueblo.
					
					 El Presidente del Comite de Estado del Republica Popular Democratica de Corea declaro rotundamente que cobrara sin falta el precio del disparate del mandatario estadounidense que delante del mundo nego e insulto la misma existencia de nuestro Estado y peroro el disparate de que eliminara nuestra Republica, subrayo y continuo:
					
					  La declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC refleja la indignacion y la voluntad de todos los militantes del PTC y los habitantes coreanos de acabar sin falta con la confrontacion con el imperialismo norteamericano que se atrevio a denigrar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y expuso abiertamente la intencion de imponer al pueblo coreano las calamidades de guerra nuclear.
					
					  Ademas, sirve del gran estimulo a la lucha de los partidos politicos y pueblos progresistas del mundo por frustrar las maniobras de provocacion de guerra del imperialismo yanqui, cabecilla de los reaccionarios imperialistas y perturbador de la paz del mundo, y construir una nueva sociedad independiente, pacifica y justa.
					
					  Hoy dia, la lucha resuelta contra el imperialismo yanqui, cuyo modo de subsistencia es la agresion y guerra, deviene el remedio principal para asegurar la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					  La confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU. ensena la verdad de que hay que responder con el remedio nuclear de justicia a los artefactos nucleares de injusticia para implementar la autentica justicia internacional y defender el basico derecho a la subsistencia de la humanidad.
					
					  El Comite Central del PTC exhorta a los partidos politicos de varios paises del mundo amantes de la independencia, justicia y paz a levantarse unanimemente en la accion conjunta y el frente conjunto contra EE.UU. para frustrar las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. que trata de acarrear las calamidades nucleares al mundo.
					
					  Y expresa la esperanza y seguridad de que enviaran el apoyo y solidaridad invariables a la justa lucha del PTC y el pueblo coreano por defender la soberania, la dignidad y el derecho a la subsistencia del pais y salvaguardar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region.

articles.title: Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de APS envia mensaje abierto a parlamentos de varios paises
articles.content:
Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de APS envia mensaje abierto a parlamentos de varios paises 
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea emitio el dia 24 un mensaje abierto a los parlamentos de varios paises del mundo.
					Trump, presidente de EE.UU., que se autodenomina la "superpotencia", sorprendio a todo el mundo soltando en la ONU, suprema escena diplomatica oficial del mundo, el disparate brutal que niega la existencia misma de la RPDC y que "destruira totalmente" a este pais asiatico, inicia la misiva y continua:
					
					 La Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, que tiene como su mision principal el promover las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los parlamentos y los pueblos amantes a la paz de todos los paises del mundo a base de la politica exterior del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que toma como ideal la independencia, paz y amistad, denuncia severamente el imprudente disparate de Trump como un imperdonable insulto al pueblo coreano, declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC y una rigurosa amenaza a la paz del mundo.
					
					  Desde el inicio de su mandato, Trump actuaba con arrogancia y arbitrariedad convirtiendo en papel mojado las leyes y acuerdos internacionales que no le gustan, bajo la doctrina de "dar primacia a EE.UU.", modo de pensamiento de estilo norteamericano que no importa nada el mundo, sino EE.UU.
					
					  Utilizando el palo nuclear y la coaccion doblego a los paises indecisos y egoistas que piensan solo en sus intereses y abuso hasta del nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para inventar la ilegal "resolucion de sancion anti-RPDC" que niega el elemental derecho a subsistencia del pueblo coreano e impide el normal desarrollo economico violando la Carta de la ONU, lo cual deviene el acto concentrado del la "teoria de dar prioridad a EE.UU."
					
					  Su disparate de destruir totalmente a nuestro pais, digno Estado soberano e independiente y potencia nuclear, es una locura extremista igual con el intento de destruir el mundo entero.
					
					  Sera una gran equivocacion e ignorancia si Trump piensa en que con la amenaza de guerra nuclear puede doblegar a la RPDC, potencia nuclear.
					
					  Es precisamente la guerra nuclear el verdadero rival de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, convertida en innegable potencia nuclear que cuenta con los arsenales nucleares y los medios de transportes de ojivas nucleares diversificados, desarrollados por cuenta de autofortalecimiento.
					
					  La Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la APS de la RPDC expresa la esperanza y conviccion de que en esta oportunidad los parlamentarios de varios paises del mundo, amantes a la independencia, la paz y la justicia, cumpliran con su mision y deber en la realizacion del deseo de la humanidad sobre la justicia y paz internacionales, redoblando la vigilancia sobre la campana atroz y imprudente de la administracion Trump de llevar el mundo a la calamidad nuclear horrible.

articles.title: Parten hacia Moscu Choe Son Hui y su comitiva
articles.content:
Parten hacia Moscu Choe Son Hui y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La directora general de America del Norte del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Choe Son Hui, y su comitiva partieron hoy de esta capital para visitar a Moscu cumplimentando la invitacion del embajador itinerante de la cancilleria de la Federacion Rusa, Oleg Burmistrov, quien realizo una visita a la RPDC del 22 al 25 de julio.
					La comitiva de Choe sostendra en Moscu las conversaciones con el invitante.

articles.title: CRC califica a Trump de gangster que perturba la paz
articles.content:
CRC califica a Trump de gangster que perturba la paz
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Religiosos de Corea publico el dia 25 una declaracion denunciando al viejo loco de EE.UU. que pronuncio el inaudito disparate de la "destruccion total" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 En la actual epoca de civilizacion, completamente diferente a la tenebrosa Edad Media, no hubo ningun mandatario que haya prometido como Trump la "destruccion total" de un Estado soberano a plena luz del dia y a la vista del mundo.
					
					  Asi subraya el documento y prosigue:
					
					  Sufriendo los desastres de la guerra coreana provocada por el imperialismo yanqui, los religiosos de la RPDC calificaron hace mucho tiempo de satanicos y diabolicos a los agresores norteamericanos que destruyeron millares de instalaciones religiosas y mataron a cientos de miles de creyentes inocentes mediante el bombardeo indiscriminado.
					
					  Tan pronto como ocupara la Casa Blanca, foco del mal, Trump intranquiliza mas que nunca el mundo entero amenazando y chantajeando a todos los paises. No hay duda de que el carece de cualidades propias de un politico y es un bribon y gangster que siente aficion por la guerra.
					
					  El disparate de Trump significa la tonteria del psicopata que se halla asfixiado en el abismo de arruinamiento tragico y el ultimo pataleo de los asustados ante el avance vigoroso de la RPDC hacia el futuro radiante.
					
					  La justicia y la injusticia son incompatibles al igual que la luz y la oscuridad.
					
					  La realidad de hoy demuestra claramente que mientras existan Trump y sus lacayos, el mundo no podra vivir tranquilo ni se realizara la aspiracion de nuestros religiosos a la justicia y la paz.
					
					  Nuestros religiosos, que aprecian el amor, la paz y la justicia, no pueden tolerar nunca la locura antietica de Trump que actua con frenesi para destruir totalmente el terreno de vida religiosa quitandose la hipocrita mascara de "apostol de la paz" y negando la existencia del digno Estado soberano.
					
					  Todos los religiosos de la RPDC, estimulados por la declaracion del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, desarrollaran con mayor coraje junto con todos los militares y habitantes la sagrada guerra pannacional para domar implacablemente con el fuego de justicia a Trump, caudillo de agresion, destruccion y asesinato.

articles.title: Vocero de la Union de la Juventud advierte a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Vocero de la Union de la Juventud advierte a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Los jovenes coreanos, que consideran como su vida la defensa a ultranza al lider, declaran con solemnidad su voluntad de eliminar a todos los psicopatas, que actuan sin conocer quien es su rival, y lograr sin falta la victoria final en la confrontacion con los Estados Unidos.
					Asi subraya el vocero del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista en su declaracion fechada hoy y prosigue:
					
					El viejo maniaco Trump dijo palabras histericas tales como "destruccion total" y "extincion" ofendiendo la maxima dignidad y la soberania de nuestro Estado no en la Casa Blanca ni en el campo de golf sino en la oficial arena de la Asamblea General de la ONU, hecho que significa la mas perversa provocacion e imperdonable crimen contra el pueblo y los jovenes coreanos.
					
					Trump, quien habla como le da la gana, no es un politico ni hombre sino el capo de gangsteres y perro rabioso.
					
					Hemos advertido con palabras comprensible a ese ignorante e imprudente, cada vez que este decia tonterias como "opcion militar" y "sancion y presion superduras". 
					
					Puesto que el no quiso entender esas advertencias, le hemos demostrado tambien con acciones el inagotable poderio de la potencia Paektusan mediante el lanzamiento de ICBM y la prueba de la bomba H.
					
					Pero, hasta la fecha, ese vejete no presta oidos a nuestras reiteradas advertencias, lo que nos obliga a tomar la decision de domarlo con fuego.
					
					Nuestras generaciones escribiran con letras mayusculas la ultima pagina de destruccion ignominiosa de EE.UU. continuando la tradicion de los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses, quienes derrotaron en la selva del monte Paektu al bandidesco imperialismo japones, y de los heroicos soldados de la decada de 1950 quienes crearon el mito de victoria del 27 de julio venciendo al imperialismo norteamericano.
